chesttracker.title: Chest Tracker
chesttracker.gui.memoryManager.title: Manage Memory Banks
chesttracker.gui.editMemoryBank.deleteKe: Delete the key %s from the selected Memory Bank.
chesttracker.config.irreversable: Warning: this action can not be undone.
chesttracker.config.mainGui.autofocusSea: Whether to automatically focus the search bar when the GUI is opened.
chesttracker.config.memoryKeyIcons.descr: Defines how the buttons for the Memory Keys are labelled. Supports NBT (through the config file). The order of this list defines in what order they show up in.
chesttracker.config.managementGui.hideMe: Hide the Memory Bank ID from the edit GUIs, in case you're streaming and want to hide an IP or similar.
You can still view the ID by hovering over the ID field in the edit GUI.
chesttracker.config.storage.storageBacke: Defines how Memory Banks are stored between worlds/sessions.
Stores all Memory Banks as JSON files in your game's 'chesttracker' directory. Readable, but takes up more disk space.
Stores all Memory Banks as NBT files in your game's 'chesttracker' directory. More compact, but not readable without an external viewer.
Stores Memory Banks in game memory.
Warning: all Memory Banks stored this way are lost when the game closes.
chesttracker.config.storage.json.readabl: Whether the JSON files in the memory directory should be readable, or compacted.
chesttracker.config.whereisit.tooltip: Open Where Is It's config; go here to change highlight rendering.
